actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide additional cost-of-living adjustments in civil service retirement annuities of certain retired employees in Alaska as long as retired employees continue to reside in Alaska.

summary.text: Increases by 25 percent the civil service annuity payments of retired employees who performed ten years of service in Alaska and continue to reside in Alaska.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide additional cost-of-living adjustments in civil service retirement annuities of certain retired employees in Alaska as long as retired employees continue to reside in Alaska.
